data.actual_result: Your profile has a black background.
data.expected_result: Your profile should have a transparent background.
data.short_description: When you join and speak in a voice channel, your profile picture is shown in black background even if your profile's background is transparent.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel. - Open the channel drawer and go to a text channel and close keyboard. - Speak in the voice channel.
